code: import React,{useEffect}from"react";import"./ParallaxSection.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ParallaxSection=()=>{useEffect(()=>{const cursorLight=document.querySelector(".cursor-light");const moveCursorLight=e=>{cursorLight.style.transform="translate(".concat(e.clientX-50,"px, ").concat(e.clientY-50,"px)");};document.addEventListener("mousemove",moveCursorLight);return()=>{document.removeEventListener("mousemove",moveCursorLight);};},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"parallax",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-container heart-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Happy Birthday"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"My Favorite Person"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"heart heart1"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"heart heart2"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"heart heart3"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"heart heart4"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"heart heart5"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"heart heart6"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"cursor-light"})]})});};export default ParallaxSection;
